titles.title: I am not skilled to understand

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That He should leave His place on high And come for sinful man to die, You count it strange? So once did I Before I knew my Savior!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And, oh, that He fulfilled may see The travail of His soul in me, And with His work contented be, As I with my dear Savior!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, living, dying, let me bring My strength, my solace from this spring— That He who lives to be my King Once died to be my Savior!{/lang-eng}
